price: (44) And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling,[1559] they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
footnotes: [1559]- Marking the onset of Allāh's punishment, as they had requested.
